EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for attending the assessment at The Challenge. We very much enjoyed meeting you and I am pleased to offer you the role of {!Job_Application__c.Role_to_assess_for__c}. This role is dependant on the receipt of a satisfactory enhanced CRB check. Please reply to this email to confirm your acceptance of this offer and your attendance at your training session as soon as possible.
TRAINING The training will take place at The Challenge London office from 9-5PM. Lunch will be provided. The London office is located at 75 Westminster Bridge Road London SE1 7HS. Please see below for details of training for your specific skill and region of work:
London Enterprise - June 12th Photography - June 13th Media - June 14th Drama - June 15th
Northwest/Birmingham Enterprise- June 11th Photography - June 12th Media - June 13th Drama - June 14th
During training, you will learn all you need to know about The Challenge and your role. Please note that accommodation and travel will be provided for those travelling to London from Birmingham and the North West. Those travelling from Birmingham will receive accommodation the night before training. Those travelling from the Northwest will receive accommodation the night before and the night of training.
We will be verifying CRB documents please bring the originals and passport with you (see below).
WORK DATES The Practitioner works for 36 days over July and August.
The work dates for this role are: 3-5, 8-10, 13-15, 18-20, 23-25, 27-28, 30 July 2-4, 7-9, 12-14, 17-19, 22-24, 26-28 August
Role variations The MAK role will end on 19th August. The HEK role will start on 8th July and end on 19th August.
CRB Your role is subject to a enhanced CRB or List 99 check. We will require scanned documents from you in order to process this. Please visit http://carecheck.arrangementcms.co.uk/index.php?node=ID-Rules for information on which documents are needed. It is very important that you send scanned copies of your documents as soon as possible as your role with us is dependant on a satisfactory CRB.
In order to apply for your CRB, please follow these instructions. Please note that you do not need to enter a password.
Visit www.carecheck.co.uk Click on the Applicant tab Please read all the notes and instructions Click on Click here to continue Click on Criminal Records Bureau (CRB) Application Form Click on Start a New Application Enter the Organisation Reference: evolutionrecruitment Enter your personal information to apply for the CRB check.
Please submit your documents for verification on the below form. Please go to http://carecheck.arrangementcms.co.uk/index.php?node=ID-Rules for information on which documents can be accepted. We also request that you submit your dietary requirements and any medical information (such as allergies) that we need to know about, so that we can cater for you during training and during your role on The Challenge.

Please click on the link below to submit your scanned documents and any information that we need to know in order meet your medical and dietary needs while you are with us.
If you already have an enhanced CRB, we will accept it if the document is dated 1 September 2011 or later. Please submit a scanned copy through the online form.
http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3b1353e7938ac86&q1={!Contact.Id}&q2={!Job_Application__c.Id}
Congratulations on your success and we look forward to working with you on The Challenge.
Best wishes,
